rComments: Paulson provided insight into different treatments of ideology(gramsci,franfurt,althuser etc)as well as how they might apply to contemporary political movements in the US (i.e. neo-con).Paulson's experience with the subject in general, and the readings in particular, helped to articulate the contradictions between pop movements and pop ideology.

Popular Culture and Ideology...music, tv? NO! Wrong. All you learn is about white conservatism. Enormous amounts of dung (reading) for this class. Lecture is pointless and his lectures don't even correlate with his topics. It's probably because the class doesn't have ANY STRUCTURE at ALL
